name: Dark Parables: Ballad of Rapunzel HD - A Hidden Object Fairy Tale Adventure
name_original: Dark Parables: Ballad of Rapunzel HD - A Hidden Object Fairy Tale Adventure
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Strange and deadly pollen is spreading around the world, and you’ve been hired to track down its source. But the secrets you discover in the fabled kingdom of Floralia are much darker than you imagined...

• IS RAPUNZEL REALLY A KILLER?
Rumor has it that Princess Rapunzel is somehow involved – the haunting melody she sings appears to summon the pollen…

• AN EXCITING TWIST ON A CLASSIC FAIRY TALE!
But how did the once-loved princess come to control such a deadly force? And who is the mysterious, shadowy figure always by her side?

• EXPOSE THE DARK FORCES BEHIND AN EVIL PLAN
Travel through lush visuals and search for objects that open doors to new areas and initiate one of the many challenging puzzles to solve. The secrets you uncover may be darker than you imagined!

• REUNITE WITH FAMILIAR FACES IN THE BONUS CHAPTER
Choose wisely, there are three different possible endings to your adventure! Plus, enjoy bonus features such as stunning wallpapers and concept art and more!
